input.value: .Net, Consulting, Development, Genetic, HTTP, Manager, Management, Networks, Research, Security, Unix, Windows

div.div: .Net, Consulting, Development, Genetic, HTTP, Manager, Management, Networks, Research, Security, Unix, Windows

span.font: Our Data Protection Subject matter experts manage equipment and security processes that protect the integrity and confidentiality of client information by ensuring appropriate controls are in place to control data visibility. This position will engineer solutions for data visibility & loss prevention technologies in the information security environment and will support current and future designs. The security engineer is expected to work independently with internal clients and senior management on information security issues and strategies; they will also manage new and existing requirements involving Data Protection, and fully document processes and solutions.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: A Subject Matter Expert responsible for confidentiality of client information and compliance with department standards and procedures.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Designs, installs, implements, maintains, and troubleshoots complex operating systems software and related program products.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Provides technical consulting on the use and integration of applications into the operating environment.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Member of team responsible for engineering of DLP security solutions for First Data, to include, but not limited to: Laptops, Desktops, Virtual Desktops, Mobile platforms, Email, Proxy, Sensitive Data Scanning, Network Egress Monitoring, Global Deployment and Engineering Support, Operational Support Handover, Remediation Engineering and Support Engineering of the Symantec Data Loss Prevention security toolset including Policy creation, Remediation, agent deployment, email integration, proxy integration, scanning, and support preferred

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Global Security or Application Enterprise Integration Engineering preferred

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Experience with Windows and Unix Support and Engineering preferred

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Engineering of Global Agent deployments is a plus

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Research and development of mobile platform security solutions is a plus

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Solid understanding of Network and Endpoint Systems Scanning is a plus

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Fundamental knowledge of firewalls, networks, operating systems, databases, and storage preferred

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Performs additional job duties as required.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Leads strategic projects as the subject matter expert

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Provides strategic leadership.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Coaches and mentors other team members.

font.span: Works independently works with functional and business units to execute projects

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: 10+ years of related IT experience.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Master’s Degree preferred or Bachelor’s Degree with equivalent work experience and appropriate certifications.

span.font: Expert knowledge of operating systems, subsystems, and software vendor products.

span.font: Strong understanding of how technology relates to business, market and industry and applies knowledge to support the needs of critical systems and projects.

span.font: Industry Knowledge desired

First Data is an Affirmative Action – Equal Opportunity Employer (Minorities/Females/Vets/Disabled/LGBT)
First Data provides equal opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to sex, race, color, religion, marital status, national origin, age, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender (including gender identity/expression), disability, veteran status and military status, pregnancy or pregnancy-related medical conditions, or any other factor that may be protected by law.
